text: Just curious is there an official name for the drag n drop region feature in pages? I feel like the term drag n drop is not obvious to most people who are already familiar with flex columns because most would assume that’s what is being talked about.
We've been calling them "drag and drop areas", but true, I suppose a lot of people already see flex columns as drag and drop. Have you heard some confusion around it?
well, I’ve found it’s hard to explain it to people honestly
I’ve been referring to it as 2D flex columns because that’s been resonating better
not saying it should be renamed to that, that’s just the way I’ve been describing it otherwise people think I’m just talking about normal flex columns
